Title: Authorizes local or regional accidental fatality review teams where deaths are suspected to be caused by suicide or overdose
Summary: Authorizes local or regional accidental fatality review teams where deaths are suspected to be caused by suicide or overdose; authorizes an accidental fatality review team to be established at a local or regional level, with the approval of the department of health, for the purpose of investigating the unexpected or unexplained death of any person including but not limited to deaths suspected to be caused by overdose or suicide; requires the department of health to work with county health departments where trends and data are discovered.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 8 ยง269, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing local or regional accidental fatality review teams where deaths are suspected to be caused by suicide or overdose
